channel.title: Application Servers Overview :: CIS 527 Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides 10 Tips for Successfully Implementing Enterprise Software from Liquid State An Analyst’s Guide to Evaluating Enterprise Software from Automation World 18 Enterprise Software Selection Risks and How to Avoid Them from CIO.com Video Transcript This module is all about application servers. So, before we begin talking about them in-depth, we should first discuss what an application server actually is. In this class, I’ll be referring to an application server as any server that runs an enterprise application.
